content.raw:
Hi, 

I am a new in Gazebo.
I am building a plugin that generates depth frame at a input pose of a depth sensor.

the plugin that I want to make is as follows
1. subscribe a pose
2. then, generate a depth frame corresponding to the pose
3. waiting for a pose from subscriber

In the existing plugin, an event function, ConnectNewDepthFrame is used to get new frame from the sensor. But I didn't get an answer with that function.


Thanks in advance
content.html:
Hi,

I am a new in Gazebo. I am building a plugin that generates depth frame at a input pose of a depth sensor.

the plugin that I want to make is as follows 1. subscribe a pose 2. then, generate a depth frame corresponding to the pose 3. waiting for a pose from subscriber

In the existing plugin, an event function, ConnectNewDepthFrame is used to get new frame from the sensor. But I didn't get an answer with that function.

Thanks in advance
